original_title: Repairs of generator 1 of Norochcholai power plant to be completed within next 4 days: CEB Spokesman
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Ceylon Electricity Board says that the repairs of generator 1 of the Norochcholai power plant will be concluded within the next 4 days.
Generator 1 of the Norochcholai power plant underwent a technical failure, resulting in an islandwide power outage.
Spokesperson of the CEB Engineer Noel Priyantha says that meanwhile generator 3 has now been reconnected to the national grid.
He says that due to the generation of hydropower and Christmas vacations, the electricity demand has reduced.
Fears of wider war as Israeli-linked tanker is set on fire by drone attack off India
“Fuel companies advised to maintain 50% stocks during festive season”, says State Minister D.V. Chanaka
